lede: Wildland Firefighter Class to be held Spring 2023
body:
San Juan Island Fire & Rescue will be conducting a Wildland Fire Fighter class this spring.  The class will consist of independent online instruction (self-paced with a firm deadline for completion) followed by a culminating in-person instruction session and training burn June 10th and 11th.  After successful completion of the class and subsequent completion of a physical fitness test, members will be able to respond with San Juan Island Fire & Rescue in protecting the community from wildfires. 

If you are interested, please complete a 

[Volunteer Application](/assets/images/volunteer-application.pdf)

 and submit via email or in person to:

San Juan Island Fire & Rescue\
1011 Mullis St.

Email:  kkuetzing@sjifire.org

Applications must be received by close of business **May 17th**.
title: Wildland Firefighter Class to be held Spring 2023
